sense.name: make known, declare
sense.examples: She announced at dinner that she was getting a tatoo. The President is announcing the cessation of hostilities on TV right now.

sense.name: name, identify
sense.examples: He announced the winners of the spelling bee The butler will announce each guest as they arrive at the ball.

sense.name: foretell
sense.examples: Flocks of migrating Canadian geese announce the coming of fall. For some, the sinking of the Titanic announced the end of the Edwardian era.
